front.title: The IETF is for Everyone: Toward Inclusive and Equitable Participation in Internet Governance

author.organization: University of Toamasina / ISOC Comoros Chapter

abstract.t: This document aims to foster a deeper reflection within the IETF community on inclusive participation, equitable access, and the implications of global meeting venue selections on diverse contributors. It seeks to complement existing RFCs by proposing additional dialogue, tools, and evaluation mechanisms.
